overview: Five women and a nymphomaniac aunt receive two nephews to spend time in their manor house in Petrópolis. In reality, however, the boys are not nephews, but masseuses hired by the caretaker at the behest of their aunt. While things are happening in the manor, the five women are blackmailed, as a result of the strange death of a man who had disappeared in the past, considered by the press as the victim of his aunt, the biggest suspect.
title: Solar das Taras Proibidas
